mapper.select: select god_num,god_name,god_normalprice,god_sellingprice,god_stock,god_displaytype,god_regdate,god_viewpoint,godc_name,god_detailinfo,god_intro,god_memo,god_sellinglimit,god_listimageurl,god_mainimageurl from goods join goods_categories on (goods.godc_num = goods_categories.godc_num) where god_num = #{godNum}
mapper.insert:
select god_seq.nextval FROM dual
insert into goods values(#{godNum},#{godNormalPrice},#{godSellingPrice},#{godMainImageUrl},#{godListImageUrl},#{godStock},#{godSellingLimit},#{godName},#{godDisplayType},sysdate,0,#{godcNum},#{memo},#{godDetailInfo},#{godIntroduce})

insert all
into goods_sub_images values(#{image},#{godNum},#{index}+1)
select * from dual

insert all
into goods_option values(#{list.godNum},#{list.optName},#{list.optContent},#{list.optPrice})
select * from dual

insert all
into intros values(#{list.godNum},#{list.itrName},#{list.itrContent})
select * from dual
